title: The Year in Open Source Hardware: Car Things and OpenWrt One
author: David Cassel
description: Open Hardware isn't just about abstract principles. Several projects this year offered powerful demonstrations of why Open Hardware is needed.
cntitle: 开源硬件年度回顾：Car Things 和 OpenWrt One
cndescription: 开源硬件不仅仅是抽象的原则。今年的几个项目有力地证明了为什么需要开源硬件。
